title: Re-Playlist
description:
Description :
        With his handsome face and genius musical abilities, Yohan has many followers on social media. During the band's live shows, she is attracted to Gyeom, who cries while watching her from the stage, and they have a hot one-night love, but Gyeom runs off without saying goodbye to Yohan! While searching for band members to produce a new album, Yohan learns that Gyeom, who spent the night with him, is the bassist. And didn't want to lose him, so he proposed that he join his band. .... Don't have a place to live because your deposit money was cheated? Then, stay with me!
